flawed_nl_solution:
He runs the race in 5/15=1/4 of an hour
So he runs the race in 60/4=<<60/4=15.0>>15.0 minutes
That means he beat the next fastest guy by 23-15.0=<<23-15.0=8.0>>8.0 minutes

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5/15, not 1/4. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
